meanings.definition: A person, animal, or thing that is part of a group or team.
meanings.sent1: Every student in our class is a member of the school choir.
meanings.sent2: The soccer team welcomed a new member to their group.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot became an unexpected member of the conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her contagious laughter made her a cherished member of the group.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter was a brave member of the rescue team.

meanings.definition: A part of a whole, especially a limb or organ of the body.
meanings.sent1: His injured leg was a painful member of his body.
meanings.sent2: The heart is a vital member of the human body.
meanings.sent3: The sneezing nose seemed like a rebellious member of the face.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the tree are like members reaching towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The fingers are nimble members that help us grasp things.

meanings.definition: A component or element of a larger structure or system.
meanings.sent1: Each gear is an essential member of the clock mechanism.
meanings.sent2: The circuit board is a crucial member of the computer system.
meanings.sent3: The colorful tile was a standout member of the mosaic design.
meanings.sent4: The melody played by the flute was a harmonious member of the orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The key ingredient is a key member of the recipe for success.
